document.full_text: the second-round showdown between the washington capitals and the tampa bay lightning may turn on an intriguing matchup that pits the youngest starting goaltender in the playoffs against the oldest one to appear in this postseason.
document.title: capitals vs. lightning: youth meets experience in goal
lines_and_colors: the second-round showdown between the washington capitals and the tampa bay lightning may turn on an intriguing matchup that pits the youngest starting goaltender in the playoffs against the oldest one to appear in this postseason.
